status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
A user from community is seeing this issue related to tableview row seperator padding.
When he creates a dynamic tableview the row separator seems to be padded 30px on both left & right side. 
According to him, normally these are padded 16px on the left.
If he creates a static tableview with rows defined in alloy then it look fine.

Link : https://community.appcelerator.com/topic/3419/ios-dynamic-grouped-tableview-rows-separator-bug-5-0-0ga
fields.summary: IOS: Dynamically created tableviews's seen to have wrong row separator padding
